attributes.action: Stop the Diabetes Discrimination and make it illegal
attributes.additional_details: There are many different forms of Diabetes but people who are diagnosed as type 2 diabetics get a massive amount of discrimination. The media responds by calling diabetics "fatties and tubbies" I want to make people aware of the causes of diabetes, the impact the abuse of diabetics from  the media and public have on diabetcs and make it illegal to bully/discriminate others on their weight/diabetes. People need to be aware that there are lots of different types of diabetes. It's unacceptable to be bullied by anyone for their diabetes.
